| `center`        | `center`         |             | `boolean`                                  | `false`                       |
| `content`       | `content`        |             | `string`                                   | `'This is the card content.'` |
| `imageUrl`      | `image-url`      |             | `string`                                   | `''`                          |
| `isHighlighted` | `is-highlighted` |             | `boolean`                                  | `false`                       |
| `size`          | `size`           |             | `"auto" \| "large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `'medium'`                    |
